English: Help! The glowing ball of light known as Neon has fallen into The Labyrinth. Help him escape by unlocking doors that open by shining the concenrated beam of light on their respective panels. The source of your concentrated beam of light is stationary, so you will need to strategically pick up and place down glass objects so that the light's refractions hit the target panel.
Spanish: Ayuda! La bola de luz conocida como Neon ha caido en El Laberinto. Ayudalo a escapar desbloqueando puertas que se abren al iluminarlas con el rayo concentrado de luz en cada uno de sus respectivos paneles. La fuente de luz es estatica, asi que deberas manipular objetos de vidrios estrategicamente para que la luz se refleje y golpee los paneles
Escapa antes de que el tiempo se acabe!

English: Move around using the arrow keys and adjust the angle of the camera by dragging the mouse!
Spanish: Muevete usando las teclas con flechas y ajusta la camara moviendo el raton!

English: Different Glass Objects can only reflect concentrated light in a certain direction. Check to see what direction they reflect at!
Spanish: Objetos de vidrio differentes solo pueden reflejar la luz en una direccion especifica. Revisa bien en que direccion se reflejaran!

English: Pick up and place down glass objects to reflect concentrated light and hit the panels!
Spanish: Levanta y coloca los objectos de vidrio para reflejar la luz y golpear los paneles!
